title: #136 Philippa Perry
itunes:title: #136 Philippa Perry
itunes:subtitle: This week I’m talking to the psychotherapist, author + broadcaster Philippa Perry about her friend Bonnie. As ever we talk grief, the jokes only that person understands + winning the races in your dreams You can follow Philippa at @philippa...
description:
This week I’m talking to the psychotherapist, author + broadcaster Philippa Perry about her friend Bonnie. As ever we talk grief, the jokes only that person understands + winning the races in your dreams 


You can follow Philippa at @philippa_perry and you can follow Griefcast on Twitter and Instagram @TheGriefcast


Griefcast is hosted by Cariad Lloyd, edited by Kate Holland, recorded at Whistledown Studios (or Cariad's living room in lockdown), artwork is by Jayde Perkin and the music is provided by The Glue Ensemble. And remember, you are not alone.


Rose D'or Nominee 2019, Podcast of the Year 2018, Best Podcast ARIA's 2018.

"the pandemic's most important podcast" Telegraph



Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.



See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.
